JobTitle: *New* Nike Factory Store- Head Coach (Store Manager) Salem NH
JobFullDesc:
The future of Nike has never looked better.

Our purpose is to unite the world through sport to create a healthy planet, active communities, and an equal playing field for all.
In order to stay at the top of our game, we’re always looking to level-up with outstanding people who provide the kind of above-and-beyond service that inspires Nike fans for life!
As a member of Nike Retail, you'll be part of a diverse & inclusive team with opportunities for personal growth and professional development, all in a casual work environment where you can be your authentic self. And, with a generous employee discount and an overall benefits package that’s among the best around, we’re pretty confident you’re going to love it here!

MORE ABOUT THIS ROLE

As a Nike Head Coach, your mission is to bring Nike to life for our consumers. The Head Coach is accountable for developing both leaders and athletes within a high profile/volume store to successfully implement Nike’s programs and premium consumer experience(s) in order to drive business results.

WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR

A top-tier retail leader with a successful track record for building a dynamic large volume store in a fast-paced environment, with high-visibility and potential brand impact. The ideal candidate has the ability to build inclusive, diverse teams through hiring, professional development, ongoing training, and consistent accountability. This leader will have the skillset to identify technical, operational, and organizational roadblocks and seek partnership to resolve them promptly. They will lead, value, and inspire their team to prioritize customer service and deliver the Nike experience to our consumers. A strong connection to the community will be supported by Nike’s Community Ambassador program to further build partnerships within the local community.

WHAT YOU WILL WORK ON

As an elevated leader, you will directly lead all levels from Assistant Store Manager to Sales Associate. You will drive Store Operations and Brand Initiatives including P/L statements, labor management, expenses, activations and programs. You are tasked with coordinating all the Team and Business results (critical metrics) of the store.
You will lead people, store operations, and store environment to achieve sales, service, organization, customer satisfaction, and profitability goals while maintaining safety and operational standards. You are responsible for communication and delivery of rewards and recognition of the store team. You will build succession plans and effectively handle performance and corrective action processes to drive People Strategy planning. 

WHO YOU WILL WORK WITH

The Head Coach provides support to the Retail District Director to develop long term strategies for store growth and opportunity. You’ll work closely with District Partners to maintain safety standards, compliance, loss prevention practices and facilities management.
